title: Me Gano change-a-da font 4 you pisano :-)
content:
No sooner than you can say Johnny Cache (and refresh your web browser) than a new featured font falls full face on your fat fadora. Gad Zuuks! it’s an FFing Megano bold as you please!

ChrisL

 [‹ What is the funnest font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121154409/http:/www.typophile.com/node/43555 "Go to previous forum topic") [One type for each month of the year. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121154409/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44497 "Go to next forum topic")
author: dezcom

comments.content: It would be cool if Jimmy Font’s face rendered in the featured font, eh Chris?

Dat would be a major league catch :-)

[http://www.npblbaseball.com/npbl/sr/p1027.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121154409/http:/www.npblbaseball.com/npbl/sr/p1027.html "http://www.npblbaseball.com/npbl/sr/p1027.html")

ChrisL
